errors.message:
Internal matching error when running yaml.github-actions.security.curl-eval.curl-eval on .github/workflows/pr-validation.yml:
 An error occurred while invoking the Semgrep engine. Please help us fix this by creating an issue at https://github.com/semgrep/semgrep

rule yaml.github-actions.security.curl-eval.curl-eval: metavariable-pattern failed when parsing $SHELL's content as Bash: echo "## R`US Security Validation Summary" > security-summary.md
echo "**PR:** #$PR_NUMBER" >> security-summary.md
echo "**Branch:** $BRANCH_NAME" >> security-summary.md
echo "**Commit:** $COMMIT_SHA" >> security-summary.md
echo "**Date:** $(date)" >> security-summary.md
echo "" >> security-summary.md

echo "### R`TK Security Checks" >> security-summary.md
if [ -f "safety-report.json" ]; then
  echo "D]F **Safety (Dependencies):** Report generated" >> security-summary.md
else
  echo "D^M **Safety (Dependencies):** No report found" >> security-summary.md
fi

if [ -f "bandit-report.json" ]; then
  echo "D]F **Bandit (Python Security):** Report generated" >> security-summary.md
else
  echo "D^M **Bandit (Python Security):** No report found" >> security-summary.md
fi

if [ -f "semgrep-report.json" ]; then
  echo "D]F **Semgrep (Static Analysis):** Report generated" >> security-summary.md
else
  echo "D^M **Semgrep (Static Analysis):** No report found" >> security-summary.md
fi

if [ -f "pip-audit-report.json" ]; then
  echo "D]F **pip-audit (Package Vulnerabilities):** Report generated" >> security-summary.md
else
  echo "D^M **pip-audit (Package Vulnerabilities):** No report found" >> security-summary.md
fi

echo "" >> security-summary.md
echo "### R`hk Quality Checks" >> security-summary.md
echo "D]F **Code Formatting:** Black and isort" >> security-summary.md
echo "D]F **Linting:** Flake8 and Pylint" >> security-summary.md
echo "D]F **Type Checking:** MyPy" >> security-summary.md
echo "D]F **Tests:** pytest with coverage" >> security-summary.md
echo "D]F **Build:** Package installation and PyInstaller" >> security-summary.md

echo "" >> security-summary.md
echo "### R`TL Recommendations" >> security-summary.md
echo "- Review all security reports for vulnerabil... (truncated 250 more characters)
